Perceptor::

"If we follow your counsil, Blackstorm's loyalty will be a unsafe 
bet"replied Perceptor"We don't have waranties that after 
reprogramation she will come back to our side... Hydras, If we 
follow..."

Hydras interrumped Perceptors' com link and said "Come back to base, 
it seems that maximals captured her and we have more presssings 
things to think"

after he  cut the com link with Perceptor, Hydras looked at Maxima 
and said "What're the suggested strategies regarding the facts?"
